chunks.zh: 上班通勤遇到了点状况，拜托了各位 v 友
chunks.en: I encountered some problems during my commute to work. I'm asking for help from all V2EX users.

chunks.zh:
上班通勤遇到了点问题：

我是帮我的一个异性朋友（一个姑娘）问的，她一周偶尔有几天会上夜班，大概晚上**12 点左右下班**，**离家有个 8 公里左右。**
chunks.en:
I encountered some issues during my commute to work:

I'm asking on behalf of a female friend. She occasionally works night shifts a few days a week, finishing work around **12 AM** and living about **8 kilometers from home.**

chunks.zh: 这样的情况，请问如果打车的话，怎么打便宜，比如说券之类的，有没有推荐。
chunks.en: In this situation, if she takes a taxi, what's the most economical way? Are there any recommended discount coupons or similar options?

chunks.zh: 但其实最重要的是**安全问题**：滴滴 花小猪 之类的打车，哪一家安全一点（姑娘比较在意这一点）？
chunks.en: But the most important thing is **safety**: Among ride-hailing services like Didi and Huaxiaozhu, which is safer (she's very concerned about this)?

chunks.zh: 我给她的建议是重新找一份工作。但各位 v 友，除了这个建议，还有什么有用的建议吗？谢谢大家
chunks.en: I suggested she find a new job. But V2EX users, besides that suggestion, do you have any other useful advice? Thank you.

chunks.zh: 我的建议是：你到她的城市找一份工作，解决 2 件大事
chunks.en: My suggestion: You should find a job in her city, solving two major problems.

chunks.zh: 她只是想让你去她那里工作，而你却想着解决问题？
chunks.en: She just wants you to work in her city, and you're thinking about solving problems?

chunks.zh: 8 公里，弄个小电驴，晚上顶多 20 分钟吧
chunks.en: 8 kilometers, get a small electric scooter, it'll take at most 20 minutes at night.

chunks.zh: 你可以在她每次上车之后，给她打个电话，问她坐上车没，然后告诉她在楼下等她，等她快到家时再打一个，说你已经到楼下了。让她把手机听筒音量调大一些，最好让司机听到，这样即使司机基本上就不会有什么想法了。
chunks.en: You can call her every time she gets in the car, ask if she's in the car, then tell her you're waiting downstairs for her. When she's almost home, call again and say you're downstairs. Tell her to turn up the volume on her phone's earpiece so the driver can hear, so the driver basically won't have any wrong idea.

chunks.zh: 我媳妇认识我之前住顺义，在望京上班，因为工作关系晚上九十点钟下班，那时候要么地铁，没有 12 点这么晚，还有地铁；要么打专车，当时是神州。感觉安全和价廉难以兼得，我觉得肯定是专车更安全一些。
chunks.en: Before my wife met me, she lived in Shunyi and worked in Wangjing. Due to her job, she would get off work at 9 or 10 PM. At that time, she either took the subway (it didn't run as late as 12 AM, but there was still subway service), or took a premium car service, which was Shenzhou at the time. It feels like it's difficult to have both safety and affordability. I think premium car services are definitely safer.

chunks.zh: 不过专车成本高，那就出租车，毕竟专职的职业司机，也经过出租车公司筛选。在此基础之上，再考虑券的问题。
chunks.en: However, premium car services are expensive, so then take a taxi. After all, full-time professional drivers are also screened by the taxi company. Considering using coupons can be done after this.

chunks.zh: @wkend 「穿着保守一点」被强奸的多数是「穿保守一点」。
chunks.en: @wkend The majority of rape victims who 'dress conservatively' are those who 'dress conservatively'.

chunks.zh: 「 2018 年，比利时布鲁塞尔曾举办过一个特殊的展览，展品是 18 件女性惨遭性侵时所穿的衣服，包括 T 恤、裙子、长裤和运动服等，其中还有一件警服，每件展品都非常普通平凡，甚至让人觉得有些保守，压根和性感、暴露不沾边。」
chunks.en: 'In 2018, Brussels, Belgium, hosted a special exhibition featuring 18 pieces of clothing worn by women who were victims of sexual assault, including T-shirts, skirts, pants, and sportswear. There was even a police uniform. Each exhibit was very ordinary and even conservative, with no connection to being sexy or revealing.'

chunks.zh: 《论程序员有多直》
chunks.en: 《On How Straight Programmers Are》

chunks.zh: 绝对安全不存在呀 滴滴就完全可以了 正规出租车
chunks.en: Absolute safety doesn't exist. Didi is perfectly fine, as are regular taxis.

chunks.zh: 花小猪比较乱，都是别的平台不要的司机，坐过几次体验很差
chunks.en: Huaxiaozhu is quite messy; they use drivers that other platforms don't want. I've had a bad experience using them a few times.

chunks.zh: 让她去你的城市工作，然后你俩个一起下班🐶
chunks.en: Have her come work in your city, then you two can get off work together. 🐶

chunks.zh: 城市里面，到处都是摄像头。且自己不是 8 分以上容貌+故意着有诱惑性质的服装，就不要幻想人人都对你垂涎已久了。
chunks.en: In the city, there are cameras everywhere. And unless you're an 8/10 or higher in appearance + deliberately wearing seductive clothing, don't imagine that everyone is lusting after you.

chunks.zh: 找个男 PY ，每天接，最安全。
chunks.en: Find a male friend with benefits to pick her up every day. That's the safest.

chunks.zh: 一个埋南极一个埋月球背面🤡
chunks.en: One buried in Antarctica, and one buried on the dark side of the moon. 🤡

chunks.zh: 你可以接他下班。不要单独一个人，人多安全，
chunks.en: You can pick her up from work. Don't be alone; more people means more safety.

chunks.zh: 就事论事，穿着保守一点，打车正常打就 ok
chunks.en: Talking about the matter itself, dress a bit conservatively, and taking a regular taxi is okay.

chunks.zh: @sodadev 嗯嗯，我就是这么安慰她说的
chunks.en: @sodadev Yes, that's how I comforted her.

chunks.zh: @MrUser 没办法，我俩相隔两个城市
chunks.en: @MrUser No way, we live in two different cities.

chunks.zh: @wkend 嗯嗯，这点我跟她好好强调，她倒是挺安分的一姑娘
chunks.en: @wkend Yes, I will especially emphasize this to her. She is a very prudent girl.

chunks.zh: 花几万买个电动 mini 最安全，话说也就八公里，买个电毛驴夜里十几分钟就到家了。
chunks.en: Spending tens of thousands to buy an electric mini is the safest. Anyway, it's only eight kilometers, buying an electric moped will get her home in ten minutes at night.

chunks.zh: 直接打出租车不就行了
chunks.en: Just take a taxi directly, right?
